name: Backrooms By SideQuest
summary: Backrooms VR is the most expansive and immersive take on the iconic creepypasta universe ever made for virtual reality. Explore over 300,000 square meters of haunting liminal space across countless unique levels, each with their own layouts, moods, and hidden dangers. From flickering office corridors and moldy maintenance shafts to unsettling playgrounds and decaying hotel halls, every area is handcrafted to mess with your sense of space and reality.
